name: getmatchbywinner
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ipl_api.
Tool description: It is api thats gives the data about IPL(2008-2020) matches data . 
API description: Retrieves all cricket matches won by the specified team from the IPL API.

winner.description: The name of the team to filter matches by. Defaults to 'Kolkata Knight Riders'.
